Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Kakariko Bazaar#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.
